<<<<<<< HEAD
A prognostication for euer, made by Erra Pater, a Iew, borne in Iury, Doctor in Astronomie and Phisicke very profitable for to keepe the body in health: and also Ptholomeus saith the same. Book of knowledge Erra Pater.
[32] p.
Printed by Thomas Este, [London] : [ca. 1605]
Erra Pater is a pseudonym. Publication date suggested by STC. Running title reads: The prognostication of Erra Pater. Signatures: A-B. Formerly STC 10521. Identified as STC 10521 on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[32] p.
Printed by Thomas Este, [London] : [ca. 1605]
Erra Pater is a pseudonym. Publication date suggested by STC. Running title reads: The prognostication of Erra Pater. Signatures: A-B. Formerly STC 10521. Identified as STC 10521 on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
